## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtCRLK2, CRLK2</u>
- **Gene Name:** calcium/calmodulin-regulated receptor-like kinase 2
- **Description:**   Protein kinase superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
